A declaration of the ten holy co[m]maundementes of allmygthye God wroten Exo. 20. Deu. 5. Collectyd out of the scripture canonicall, by Joanne Hopper. Hooper, John, d. 1555.
[20], CCXXXIIII p.
Printed by Augustin Fries], [Zurich : Anno M.D.XLVIII. [1548, i.e. 1549?]
Place of publication and printer's name supplied by STC. Preface dated 5 November 1549. Signatures: A-Q. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
